```{r without NA, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, include = FALSE}
library(shiny)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggmap)
library(janitor)
library(sf)
library(mapview)
library(leaflet)
library(rgdal)
library(RColorBrewer)
library(lubridate)
library(plotly)
library(reshape2)

load("Taxi_Trips.RData")
# DATA WITHOUT NA
taxi_trips <- na.omit(taxi_trips,cols=c("Trip.Start.Timestamp","Trip.End.Timestamp",
                                        "Trip.Total","Pickup.Community.Area",
                                        "Dropoff:community.Area"))
taxi_trips <- clean_names(taxi_trips)

# Taking a sample of taxi_trips
trips <- slice_sample(taxi_trips,n=500000)

# Adding dates for trip_start
date <- as.Date(trips$trip_start_timestamp,format = "%m/%d/%Y")
trips <- cbind(trips,date)

# Adding dates for months only, years only, and day-month only
date_month <- format(trips$date, "%m")
date_year <- format(trips$date,"%Y")
date_day_month <- format(trips$date, "%m-%d")
trips <- cbind(trips,date_month,date_year,date_day_month)

# Adding a new one with floor month for each day
month_year <- floor_date(trips$date,"month")
trips <- cbind(trips,month_year)
```

# Basic time series where we have to select which period we wish to visualize

```{r Data function1, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, include = FALSE}
data_selection <- function(trips, start, end){
  my_data <- trips %>%
    filter(date >= start & date <= end)
  
  trip_date <- my_data %>%
    select(month_year, trip_total) %>%
    group_by(month_year) %>%
    summarise(trip_total = mean(trip_total))
  
  return(trip_date)
}
```

```{r making the plot1, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, include = FALSE}
time_serie <- function(trips, dates){
  start <- dates[1]
  end <- dates[2]
  p <- ggplot(data = data_selection(trips, start, end),
              aes(x = month_year, y = trip_total)) +
    geom_line(size=0.4) +
    labs(x = "Date") +
    scale_x_date(expand = expansion(mult = c(.02, .02))) +
    scale_y_continuous(n.breaks = 10, 
                       expand = expansion(mult = c(.02, .02))) +
    theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45))
    
  p <- ggplotly(p)
  return(p)
}
```

```{r UI1, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, include = FALSE}
# Defining the UI
ui <- fluidPage(
  
  sidebarPanel(
    dateRangeInput(inputId = "dates",
                   label = "Choose the interval of time you want to visualize :",
                   start = "2013-01-01", end = "2014-10-01", min = "2013-01-01",
                   max = "2021-10-01", format = "yyyy-mm-dd", startview = "year")
  ),
  
  # Main panel for displaying outputs
  mainPanel(
    plotlyOutput("plot")
  )
)
```

```{r Server1, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, include = FALSE}
# Defining the server
server = function(input, output) {
  output$plot <- renderPlotly(time_serie(trips, input$dates))
}
```

```{r shinyApp1, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, include = FALSE}
shinyApp(ui = ui, server = server)
```

# Basic time series where we have to select which period we wish to visualize

```{r Data function2, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, include = FALSE}
data_selection2 <- function(trips, years){
  my_data <- trips %>%
    filter(date_year %in% years)
  
  trip_date <- my_data %>%
    select(trip_total, date) %>%
    group_by(date) %>%
    summarise(trip_total = mean(trip_total))
  date_year <- format(trip_date$date,"%Y")
  date_day_month <- format(trip_date$date, "%m-%d")
  trip_date <- cbind(trip_date,date_year,date_day_month)
  trip_date <- trip_date[,-1]

  return(trip_date)
}
```

```{r making the plot2, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, include = FALSE}
time_serie2 <- function(trips, years){
  p <- ggplot(data = data_selection2(trips,years), aes(x = date_day_month,
                                                       y = trip_total,
                                    group = factor(date_year),
                                    colour = factor(date_year))) + 
    geom_line(size=0.4) +
    labs(x = "Date", colour = "Year") +
    scale_x_discrete(breaks = c("01-01","02-01","03-01","04-01","05-01","06-01",
                                "07-01","08-01","09-01","10-01","11-01","12-01",
                                "12-31"),
                     expand = expansion(mult = c(.02, .02))) +
    theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45)) +
    scale_y_continuous(n.breaks = 10, 
                       expand = expansion(mult = c(.02, .02)))
  p <- ggplotly(p)
  return(p)
}
```

```{r UI2, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, include = FALSE}

  sidebarPanel(

                label = "Choose which years you wish to compare (two or more):",

                            "2020"="2020","2021"="2021"),
                selected = c("2013","2014"),
                multiple = TRUE)
  ),
  
  # Main panel for displaying outputs
  mainPanel(
    plotlyOutput("plot")
  )
)
```

```{r Server2, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, include = FALSE}
# Defining the server
server2 = function(input, output) {
  output$plot <- renderPlotly(time_serie2(trips, input$years))
}
```

```{r shinyApp2, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, include = FALSE}
shinyApp(ui = ui2, server = server2)
```
